name: Eternal Dungeon (itch)
description:
The Eternal Dungeon

You wake up at the depths of a dungeon. You feel oddly light but don't know why at first. You soon realize that you're down 4 limbs and up one abandoned, monster infested dungeon. Oh well, It's a good thing you learnt to cast spells out of your mouth no matter how much the bullies punched you at the School of Wizardry. 

The Eternal Dungeon was made in 2 days for the GMTK game jam 2018 by Rami Jhirad.
